name: PrimalMyst Refreshable Resources System
description: Core framework for the three primary refreshable resources aligned with hexagonal positioning

resource_philosophy.design_principle: Three core resources that govern different aspects of character capability and align with hexagonal cosmic positioning
resource_philosophy.hexagonal_alignment: Resources are positioned at specific hexagon vertices to reinforce cosmic harmony
resource_philosophy.refresh_mechanics: All resources can be restored through rest, items, abilities, and environmental interactions

health_points.description: Life force and physical resilience - represents the character's ability to withstand damage and continue functioning
health_points.implementation_notes: Core survival resource - requires damage system integration

mana_points.description: Magical energy and divine connection - represents the character's ability to channel supernatural forces
mana_points.implementation_notes: Magical resource - requires spell system integration

stamina_points.description: Physical energy and endurance - represents the character's ability to perform strenuous actions
stamina_points.implementation_notes: Physical resource - requires action system integration

cosmic_resonance.description: Resources gain bonuses when character positioning aligns with their hexagonal corners
cosmic_resonance.implementation: Characters positioned at their resource's corner receive enhanced regeneration
cosmic_resonance.balance_note: Encourages strategic positioning without forcing rigid placements

opposing_corners.design_note: Opposite corners may provide unique interaction opportunities

pool_structure.temporary_modifications: Buffs/debuffs affecting current or maximum values
pool_structure.regeneration_rate: Speed at which resource naturally restores

depletion_effects.health_points_depletion: Physical vulnerability, unconsciousness risk, death threshold
depletion_effects.mana_points_depletion: Spell failure, magical feedback, divine disconnection
depletion_effects.stamina_points_depletion: Action penalties, movement restrictions, performance degradation

overflow_mechanics.description: Resources can temporarily exceed maximum through abilities or items
overflow_mechanics.health_points_overflow: Temporary vitality boost, enhanced healing, damage resistance
overflow_mechanics.mana_points_overflow: Spell amplification, extended casting range, magical overflow effects
overflow_mechanics.stamina_points_overflow: Enhanced speed, extra actions, performance bonuses

resource_interactions: Cross-resource abilities that consume multiple types

implementation_priorities.phase_1: Basic resource pools with simple regeneration
